body.description: The swing arm TV wall mount for LED LCD TV Monitors, makes it easy to view your TV or Monitor from different angles. Fits TV or Monitor with VESA 75x75(3"x3"), 100x100(4"x4"), 200x100 (8"x4"), 200x200 (8"x8"), maximum loading capacity 44 lbs. This dual link arm wall mount gives you 15" extension from the wall with maximum flexibility. The depth of ML14B is 2. 2 inches. You can fold it close to your wall for a low-profile appearance. Removable TV plate designed for single-person installation. Post installation level adjustment to ensure perfect level. Pan, tilt, swivel, and roll function provide smooth adjustment for all directions. Durable steel construction with black powder coated finish. Common mounting and screen attachment hardware included. Notice: This mount fits most 27-42" TVs (VESA 75x75mm (3x3")/100x100mm (4x4") without adapters, fit VESA 200x200 (8x8 ")/200x100mm (8x4") with 4 extra plate adapters), some up to 47 inch TVs produced in recent 3 years

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VideoSecu is a manufacturer of high quality, cost effective TV mounting bracket, and CCTV video security products.
VideoSecu is a manufacturer of high quality, cost effective TV mounting bracket, and CCTV video security products.

VideoSecu TV Wall Mount Monitor Bracket with Full Motion The new clean design mount is sensible cantilever mounting solution for small flat panels. The flexible articulating LCD wall mount supports flat screens with VESA 75x75mm (3"x3") or 100x100mm (4"x4") without adapters, fit VESA 200x200 (8 "x 8 "),200x100mm (8 "x 4 ") with 4 extra plate adapters. Constructed with high gauge steel material, this mount handles displays up to 44lbs. It's easy to get comfortable viewing position by forward and backward tilt. Adjustable +/-5 degrees tilt and 180 degrees swivel. Retracts to 2.4"save space; Extends up to 15" from the wall. The articulating mount offers 360 degrees of rotation to level screen horizontally. Post-installation level adjustment allows the TV to perfectly level and common hardware pack included in the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, feels quite sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this TV wall mount for my bedroom and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This wall mount met my expectations in terms of both installation ease and sturdiness.Installing this wall mount was a breeze. The package came with clear and detailed instructions that made the process smooth and hassle-free. Within minutes, I had my TV securely mounted on the wall.The sturdiness of this wall mount is impressive given the price. It is made from quality materials that feel solid and durable. I have confidence that my TV is securely held in place. The mount's design is robust and well-engineered, ensuring that my TV stays in position without any wobbling or sagging.Overall, I recommend this TV wall mount to anyone looking to maximize their space and create a wall-mounted entertainment setup. The ease of installation, sturdiness and low price of this product make it a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount worked perfectly for my 32" Samsung TV. It was easy to install once I found the stud in the wall and came with enough hardware to mount it to pretty much any TV. I didn't have to use 90% of the included hardware. Seems sturdy enough for the 32" TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product, very pleased
reviews.reviewText: My son was getting a tv for his bday and his room is small so we knew we'd want to get a wall mount. I browsed several styles and read reviews and felt this would be a good one. He got a 32 inch Samsung, it's extremely light weight tv, in fact the bracket weighs more than the tv. I was tempted to not put the bracket on a stud (mostly because the stud wasn't exactly where we wanted to put the tv) but we decided to follow the directions and put it in a stud just to be sure. It's not too far off from where we wanted it, with a little maneuvering of the mount we can position it where we want pretty much. It was pretty darn easy to get together and install UNTIL it was time to mount the tv to the bracket, the screws given were pathetically short and didn't get the job done (that's what she said lol) anyways, my husband had to go to the local hardware store and came back with 3 different sizes just to be sure. One of those sizes worked perfectly and after that it was a breeze. If it wasn't for the setback of having to go get different size screws I'd say the entire install would've taken 20 minutes at the most. It's pretty hard to maneuver the arm to get it to come out of the wall further, but the movement of tilting the screen or turning it is very easy to do. We hung it up kind of high on the wall, mostly so the kids don't try to mess with it, and we were able to tilt it down enough so the kids can see it clearly. Now my husband and I want the same setup in our room, and when we do I will definitely order this bracket again.updated 6/9/20: we purchased a second one for a 32 inch in the master bedroom. very happy with these products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Bracket, reasonable price, and very strudy
reviews.reviewText: Very nice bracket. Installation was easy and instructions were good. I had two minor issues with it:1) The bottom bolt that goes in the wall is tricky to turn since its very close to the hinge screw and there is not enough space to fit a socket head on it, so its manual wrench time. Would be nice to increase spacing by a simple 1/8th of an inch to allow a socket head to go on and turn the bolt faster.2) I had to send my son to the hardware store to get 30 mm bolts to fit the 32" Samsung. They do not come with the bracket. TVs are changing in construction very fast so be aware of the need to get more bolts if the threads on your TV are deep.Finally, with TVs being so light these days, I wonder if bracket vendors will lighten up also. This bracket almost weighed as much as the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, holds position great, Samsung TV
reviews.reviewText: Unbelievably wonderful, and easy for me, a person with limited physical abilities, to install. First, I am using this with a Samsung 32" Smart TV, and yes I needed to buy separate screws for the TV (M8x20 to use without Samsung's spacers, M8x30 with the spacers). The M8 is the size and the 20 or 30 is the length. VideoSecu did package it with a variety of screws all seem short, about 12mm length.So, using a stud finder, I marked off the stud where it was to be located. Then sketching the holes of the base, I drilled the pilot holes according to the easy to follow, for the most part, directions. Then it was a matter of simply screwing the base to the stud.I then added the four "legs" to the plate to make it fit 200x200 holes already on the TV. The M8x20 screws from ACE did the do and then the plate was securely attached to the TV.Now what makes this armature stick out from the rest of the pack....The plate has little "teeth" that make it very, very easy to put the TV onto the armature, balanced, making it easy for one person to then attach the armature and plate already secured to the TV.In use, the movable joints are nice and tight, so that the TV stays where you put it, including horizontally level. My TV needs to be adjusted between 3 positions for viewing: bed, chair, bathroom. After much use everything is still tight enough to hold the various positions. Much unlike many other reviews for other wall mounts describe.I still can't believe, nor can anyone else, that I was able to do this by myself!
es muy resistente y a buen precio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 2, 2020
